document_name: Law No. 18.195 on promotion and regulation of the production, commercialisation and use of agrofuels
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/URY/2007/URY-2007-10-30-Law No. 18.195 on promotion and regulation of the production, commercialisation and use of agrofuels_28c153543f2170750119b90bc953d2e1.pdf
document_description: One of the stated aims of the Act is to reduce greenhouse gas emissions under the Kyoto Protocol and the UNFCCC.
